exceptions.tactic: exists (quo a d (gcd_div_l d a b)), (quo b d (gcd_div_r d a b)).
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, d : nat Hd : is_gcd d (fst (a, b)) (snd (a, b)) The term "gcd_div_l d a b" has type "is_gcd d a b -> divides a d" while it is expected to have type "divides a d".

exceptions.tactic: apply (gcd_rel_prime d a b Hd); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hd was not found in the current environment.
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

exceptions.tactic: exists (quo b d (gcd_div_r d a b)), (quo a d (gcd_div_l d a b)).
exceptions.exn: In environment H7 : forall d a b : nat, is_gcd d a b -> divides b d H6 : forall a b : nat, divides a b -> nat H2 : forall d a b : nat, is_gcd d a b -> divides a d H0 : forall a b : nat, divides a b -> nat a, b, d : nat H3 : forall d' : nat, is_cd d' a b -> divides d d' H4 : divides a d H5 : divides b d The term "gcd_div_r d a b" has type "is_gcd d a b -> divides b d" while it is expected to have type "divides b d".

exceptions.tactic: now apply (gcd_rel_prime d b a (gcd_sym d a b Hd)); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hd was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a b. destruct (gcd_exists_prod (a, b)) as [d Hd]. left. exists (quo a d (gcd_div_l d a b)), (quo b d (gcd_div_r d a b)). apply (gcd_rel_prime d a b Hd); auto. right. exists (quo b d (gcd_div_r d a b)), (quo a d (gcd_div_l d a b)). now apply (gcd_rel_prime d b a (gcd_sym d a b Hd)); auto.
